makeLabelCompact

public void makeLabelCompact(int alphabetSize,
                             int textSize,
                             int stringDepth)
Creates a compact version of the label, if its length is >=2*ln(text.length-alphabet.size).

Parameters:
alphabetSize - The size of the input alphabet.
textSize - The length of the text represented by the tree.
stringDepth - The string depth of the parent node.
